attributes.action: Ban all 4x4 vehicles of Urban streets and roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These vehicles were made for off road terrain. They are like tanks on ours roads. Nearly all drivers of these vehicles have no respect for other drivers and should be made to take a seperate driving test.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
